Question
========

For a one-peaked distribution skewed to the left, the mean is

Answerlist
----------

* Smaller than the mode
* Greater than the median
* Equal to the mode

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* Smaller than the mode: Correct
* Greater than the median: Incorrect
* Equal to the mode: Incorrect
